title: Self isolating  NFB is streaming free titles including an Indigenous cinema library   CBC ca
description: The National Film of Canada has over     films  documentaries and short pieces available to stream for free and this includes a rich library of Indigenous content
content: People are self isolating across the country to flatten the curve of the Covid   pandemic but that doesn t mean you can t stay occupied The National Film Board of Canada has over     films  documentaries and short pieces available to stream for free and     chars
